activity.cando: Distinguish between synonyms in academic English

item.audiotext: Can you help me with his crossword? I need a word for "liberated".
Oh yes. The next word is "isolated". Five letters.
Well done! Now I need a word for "fight". Six letters, ending with "t".
This one's difficult. A word for "started". Nine letters.
Now I need a word for "stop something from happening".
You're good at these! The next one is "lead to". Beginning with c.
Yes, it is. What could this be? A formal word for "buy", as in "buy something in the shops".
Yes, that fits. Just a couple more. "Fake". A verb beginning with p.
Last one. A word for "formal discussions".
